subject: Esteemed Influential Indivi
body:
Esteemed Influential Individual 
 
    Your request for a bank account to send the $750 USD was received. But unfortunately due to the discrete and confidential nature of the Ceremonial Ritual and the process involved, we'll decline your request to send to a bank account.
 
 You'll have to purchase Bitcoin with the $750 and send to a private Bitcoin wallet that'll be sent to you after the purchase Bitcoin.
 
 Kindly purchase Bitcoin worth $750 so that a Private Wallet will be sent to you to to effect payment.
 
Fraternal Allen Graham
THE ILLUMINATI WORLD
Copyright Â©2022 Illuminati

subject: Re:    Esteemed Influential Indivi
body:
Hello Esteemed Individual,

Thank you for your response. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with Bitcoin. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how it works? And why is it preferred over a traditional bank transfer?

I'm also curious about the Ceremonial Ritual you mentioned. What does that entail? It sounds quite intriguing.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Sherri
